snippet: Laurene Powell Jobs has carefully entered the public sphere, pushing her agenda in education as well as global conservation, nutrition and immigration policy.
abstract: Laurene Powell Jobs, billionaire widow of Apple co-founder Steven P Jobs, is tiptoeing into public sphere, pushing her philanthropic agenda in education as well as global conservation, nutrition and immigration policy;

byline.original: By PETER LATTMAN and CLAIRE CAIN MILLER

lead_paragraph: Laurene Powell Jobs has carefully entered the public sphere, pushing her agenda in education as well as global conservation, nutrition and immigration policy.

headline.seo: Steve Jobs’s Widow Sets Philanthropy Goals
headline.main: Steve Jobs’s Widow Steps Onto Philanthropic Stage
headline.print_headline: A Modest Billionaire Makes Her Way Onto the Philanthropic Stage

keywords.value: Dream Act (Development, Relief and Education for Minors Act)
